item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Epic Steve, post:5, topic:384197”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=479958.msg3513968#msg3513968 date=1298807264]
Use getWidth()/2 and getHeight()/2, that way even if you change your size later on you wont need to worry about changing everything else over again.
[/quote]
IIRC, that sill wont be in the middle. Java uses the top left corner of the image as the image origin.

You also need to subtract the images height and width then divide by two.

Although, I could be wrong.[/quote]No, you are correct. Usually it doesn’t make that much of a difference though.
